SEARCH
Package crm.oilwhere.service

Class CustomerSegmentService

java.lang.Object
crm.oilwhere.service.CustomerSegmentService
@Service public class CustomerSegmentService extends Object
Service layer for managing customer spending data from the customer_spending_ranked table. Provides business logic to categorize customers by their spending levels. Utilizes the FilterRepository to perform database queries.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    CustomerSegmentService(FilterRepository filterRepository)
    Constructs a new FilterService with the specified FilterRepository.

  • Constructor Details

    • CustomerSegmentService

      public CustomerSegmentService(FilterRepository filterRepository)
      Constructs a new FilterService with the specified FilterRepository.
      Parameters:
      filterRepository - the repository used to interact with the customer spending data in the database

  • Method Details

    • getAllCustomerSpending

      public List<CustomerSpending> getAllCustomerSpending()
      Retrieves all customer spending records from the database. Uses JPA repository's findAll() method.
      Returns:
      a list of all Filter records representing customer spending

    • getHighValueCustomer

      public List<CustomerSpending> getHighValueCustomer()
      Retrieves customers whose total spending is in the top 10%. Uses a custom query method to retrieve all customer records ordered by total spending in descending order, then returns only the top 10%.
      Returns:
      a list of CustomerSpending records representing the top 10% of customers by spending

    • getMediumValueCustomer

      public List<CustomerSpending> getMediumValueCustomer()
      Retrieves customers whose total spending falls between the top 10% and bottom 20%. Uses a custom query method to retrieve all customer records ordered by total spending in ascending order, then returns only those between the 10% and 80% range.
      Returns:
      a list of CustomerSpending records representing customers with spending between 10% and 80%

    • getLowValueCustomer

      public List<CustomerSpending> getLowValueCustomer()
      Retrieves customers whose total spending is in the bottom 20%. Uses a custom query method to retrieve all customer records ordered by total spending in ascending order, then returns only the bottom 20%.
      Returns:
      a list of CustomerSpending records representing the bottom 20% of customers by spending
